scripts.dev: concurrently --names "ai,agent,coding-agent,mom,web-ui,tui" --prefix-colors "cyan,yellow,red,white,green,magenta" "bun run dev --filter @mariozechner/pi-ai" "bun run dev --filter @mariozechner/pi-agent-core" "bun run dev --filter @mariozechner/pi-coding-agent" "bun run dev --filter @mariozechner/pi-mom" "bun run dev --filter @mariozechner/pi-web-ui" "bun run dev --filter @mariozechner/pi-tui"
scripts.check: biome check --write . && tsgo --noEmit && bun run check --filter @mariozechner/pi-web-ui
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -ws --no-git-tag-version && bun run scripts/sync-versions.js && rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules bun.lockb && bun install
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor -ws --no-git-tag-version && bun run scripts/sync-versions.js && rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules bun.lockb && bun install
scripts.version:major: npm version major -ws --no-git-tag-version && bun run scripts/sync-versions.js && rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules bun.lockb && bun install
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run clean && bun run build && bun run check
scripts.publish: bun run prepublishOnly && npm publish -ws --access public
scripts.publish:dry: bun run prepublishOnly && npm publish -ws --access public --dry-run
